scripts.build-maze: npm ci --prefix src/demo/maze-generation-visualization/ && npm run build --prefix src/demo/maze-generation-visualization/; rm -rf public/demo/maze-generation-visualization; mkdir -p public/demo/maze-generation-visualization; mv -f src/demo/maze-generation-visualization/dist/* public/demo/maze-generation-visualization
scripts.build-tree-visual: npm ci --prefix src/demo/tree_visualization/ && npm run build --prefix src/demo/tree_visualization/; rm -rf public/demo/tree_visualization; mkdir -p public/demo/tree_visualization/; mv -f src/demo/tree_visualization/dist/* public/demo/tree_visualization
scripts.build-submodule: npm run build-maze; npm run build-tree-visual
scripts.build: npm run build-submodule; npm run build-main
